title: New Start Slate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched a DM5 stream
AND the game has yet to begin (Before pregame)
OR the user has launched a game from the beginning
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the slate on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN the slate will display "Stay Tuned: Event Will Begin Shortly" over blurred slow-motion highlights

AND the MLB logo is above the copy

title: New DAI and Mid-Inning Slate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a DM5 stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the game is currently in-between a half inning
OR the game is in-between a full inning
custom_expected:
THEN the user will view an advertisement
AND the user will also see a "Commercial Break In Progress" slate before the tv feed returns

title: New End Slate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a DM5 stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the game or postgame show has completed
AND the tv feed is removed
custom_expected: THEN user will see the "Thank You For Watching" slate

title: Quick Action Buttons
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a DM5 stream
custom_steps: When the user interacts with the quick action buttons
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to:
1. Play/Pause
2. FF/RW 30 seconds
3. Enable/Disable Closed Captions
4. Enable/Disable Box Score/OOT Scoreboard Stack
5. Connected/Disconnect to Chromecast 
6. Select Alt Feeds (Video/Audio)
7. Mute/Unmute Video Audio
8. Picture-In-Picture
9. Exit Stream
10. Utilize Scrubber

title: Alt Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched a DM5 stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the feed select button (Top-R)
AND the user selects an alternate radio feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will hear radio audio over the TV Feed

title: TV Feed Switching
custom_preconds: WHEN the user launches a DM5 game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the feed select button (Top-R)
AND the user selects a different video feed
custom_expected:
THEN the new tv feed will begin playback
AND the matching audio feed is also heard

title: In-Player Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a DM5 game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the stack button (Bottom-L)
AND the user selects a feed from the top scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN the new tv feed for a different game will launch
AND the correct matching audio feed is heard

title: Picture-In-Picture
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches a DM5 game
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the PiP quick action button
custom_expected:
THEN the video player will minimize
AND playback will continue
AND the user can navigate through the app

AND the user can interact with video player by:
1. Exiting player
2. Maximizing video player
3. Swiping the smaller video player around screen
4. Play/Pause video
5. FF/RW 10 seconds
6. Double-tapping to slightly enlarge video player
7. Double-tapping again to return to mini player

title: Settings Experience Check
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into a non-legacy account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the app's account settings
AND the user swipes down to, taps "About the MLB app"
custom_expected:
THEN the user can view the app experience aka Exp
AND this result should display "M", NOT "L"

title: Charles Experience Check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has device connected to Charles Proxy
AND the user has freshly launched the MLB app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the Charles log after launch
AND the user analyzes the following call:
https://media-gateway.mlb.com
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see "clientExperience": "MLB"
AND should NOT see "clientExperience": "Legacy"

title: Heartbeat Charles Call
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has device connected to Charles Proxy
AND the user has freshly launched the MLB app
AND the user launches a DM5 stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user views their Charles log
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see generated at stream launch: https://playback-heartbeat.mlb.com

AND call will refresh every minute during playback
